billing.description: Details related to the billing information of the account.

address1.description: First line of the billing address

address2.description: Second line of the billing address

company.description: Name of the company associated with the account

country_code.description: Country code of the billing address

email.description: Email address associated with the billing contact

first_name.description: First name of the billing contact

last_name.description: Last name of the billing contact

phone.description: Phone number of the billing contact

postal_code.description: Postal code of the billing address

state.description: State or region of the billing address

create_date.description: Date and time when the account was created

plan.description: Information about the subscription plan associated with the account.

agent_leaderboard.description: Option to enable agent leaderboard feature

agent_reports.description: Option to enable agent performance reports

chat_reports.description: Option to enable chat history reports

daily_reports.description: Option to receive daily performance reports

email_reports.description: Option to receive email performance reports

file_upload.description: Option to enable file upload functionality

goals.description: Option to set and track performance goals

high_load.description: Option to handle high load scenarios

integrations.description: Option to integrate with third-party services

ip_restriction.description: Option to restrict access based on IP addresses

max_advanced_triggers.description: Maximum number of advanced trigger rules allowed

max_basic_triggers.description: Maximum number of basic trigger rules allowed

max_concurrent_chats.description: Maximum number of concurrent chats allowed

max_history_search_days.description: Maximum number of days to search chat history

monitoring.description: Option to enable chat monitoring features

name.description: Name or title of the plan

operating_hours.description: Option to set operating hours for chat support

rest_api.description: Option to enable REST API access

sla.description: Option to enable service level agreement features

support.description: Option to include customer support services

unbranding.description: Option to remove branding from the chat interface

widget_customization.description: Option to customize the chat widget appearance
